item.title: Explore Oktas IAM Solution

item.title: Understand the reasons for an SSO App
item.description: Understand the reasons for an SSO App Click here to give feedback about this page In Phase 1?: “Yes, since it’s a new doc pulling from existing content” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, targetted towards developers Content Notes New or existing doc?: New doc with new content but also pulling from existing content Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: - All content except for the use case examples from: - Overview of Single Sign-On in the OIN: https://developer.
